## EventStream interface

An event stream is a collection of events that eventually get dispatched to a particular endpoint.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface EventStream 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [addEvent(event)](./stentor-models.eventstream.addevent.md) | Add an event to the stream. This will not be sent until the event is flushed. |
|  [flush()](./stentor-models.eventstream.flush.md) | Send all the events to the end of the stream. |
